text: Machino () is a rural locality (a village) in Beryozovskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 88 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 2.5 km east from Beryozovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Machino (Beryozovskoye Rural Settlement), Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
